title: Chinese Tennis Star Peng Shuai Appears in Beijing Amid Assault Claim
sub_head: Videos show her attending, but not speaking at, a dinner and a tennis tournament; WTA head says concerns remain about her health and safety
body:
HONG KONG—Chinese tennis star Peng Shuai appeared at a competition in Beijing organized by the state-backed China Open on Sunday, making her first public appearance since a global uproar following a Nov. 2 post on her social-media account accusing one of the Communist Party’s most senior retired leaders of sexual assault.
In photos and a video posted on the China Open’s verified account on the Twitter-like Weibo platform, Ms. Peng shared a stage at Beijing’s National Tennis Center with several sports executives as an official guest at a youth match organized by the tournament. China Open is overseen by China’s Sports Bureau and the Beijing municipal government.
